name: LostWinds 2: Winter of the Melodias
description: With amazing new abilities, re-visit a land full of wonder on a new adventure in LostWinds 2: Winter of the Melodias - sequel to the award-winning ‘LostWinds’.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-core CPU (2x2GHz) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 / AMD HD 6320 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 capable
